summary: SunCoke Energy, Inc. operates as an independent producer of coke in the Americas and Brazil. It operates through three segments: Domestic Coke, Brazil Coke, and Logistics. It offers metallurgical and thermal coal. The company also provides export and domestic material handling and/or mixing services to steel, coke, electric utility, coal producing, and other manufacturing-based customers. In addition, it owns and operates cokemaking facilities in the United States and Brazil. SunCoke Energy, Inc. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Lisle, Illinois.
